data.Name: Funk Off
data.Bio: Funk Off is an Italian Jazz band, calling themselves as the Funky Marching Jazz Band. The band came onto the scene 1998, brought together by saxophonist and 'main man', Dario Cecchini. And since then have played over 350 street, piazzas, festivals and on some great stages, "Poretta Soul festival", "Grey Cat Jazz Festival" and "Camaiore Jazz" "Toscana Music Pool" e "Umbria Jazz", "Montreux Jazz Festival", "Istanbul Jazz Festival", "Treviso Rockin Blues". Read more on Last.fm
